ComicInfo.Summary:
Haunted House
Every town has one, that creepy abandoned house that kids dare each other to explore. Some say that it’s infested with ghosts, while others talk of a horrible crime that was committed there, but what if those stories were true and that house was truly haunted? Find out in this twisted tale from Zenescope!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | EricJ & Sean Ellery | 1 | B | Cover B | Anthony Spay & Jorge Cortes | 2 | C | Cover C | Mary Laura Sanapo & Vinicius Andrade | 3 | Note: The digital edition (7/6/2016) for this issue was released before the print edition.
